Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a 72 yr old male C/O mild muscle aches, mild fever and mild chills. NKDA. Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol he denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 70 in, Weight 159 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 77, Respiration 18, HEENT: WNL, Cough present during interview with sputum production, all lung fields, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Bronchitis p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Guaifenesin - 600 mg by mouth daily, and ordered CBC, Pulse Oximetry, RSV Antigen.

Term.SOAP_SECTION: head, eyes, ears, nose, throat Examination
